1.0.name: wordpress/canonical
1.0.description:
Adds rel="canonical" URL's of your choice to the <head> of your posts and pages, instead of the default canonical link that was introduced in WordPress 2.9.

More info:

  • Canonical URL's for WordPress.
  • Read more about how to improve your WordPress SEO, so you can get the most out of this plugin.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author.
  • Check out the authors Wordpress hosting experiences.
